content: Since Bulk Data is a Argonaut project are there any sprint/ meetings scheduled like in the previous projects?
Hey Kalyani! We did have recurring calls from this spring until late summer or so, but stopped the regular calls because we had mostly hammered out the spec.
this argo project has not been quite as implementation focused as our CDS Hooks project last year.
Daniel Gottlieb and Josh Mandel are the track leads. They might have a different answer/perspective.
@Dan Gottlieb @Josh Mandel
